#summary How to check out naclports source code.

== Quick Links ==
[https://chromium.googlesource.com/external/naclports.git Git Mirror]

== Prerequisites ==

You need to install [http://dev.chromium.org/developers/how-tos/install-depot-tools depot_tools] in order to use gclient.

== Create a Client View Directory ==

{{{
mkdir naclports
cd naclports
}}}

== Create a .gclient Configuration (git) ==

{{{
gclient config --name=src  https://chromium.googlesource.com/external/naclports.git
}}}

== Sync to the repo ==
{{{
gclient sync
}}}
